comments:
Build 20021016
Linux-GTK

It's the second time I get this problem. After a while, the pop-up menu stop
working, every time I right click on an element, I get an internal error dialog:
"A SWT error has occured [...] Exit workspace?"

I get the following message on the consol:

bind fail, no free callback slot ******* 
Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Reason:
No more callbacks

and the following trace in the log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 17, 2002 13:38:38.31
!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Oct 17, 2002 13:38:38.35
!MESSAGE No more callbacks
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: No more callbacks
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2164)
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2071)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:294)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Menu.setVisible(Menu.java:784)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.processMouseDown(Control.java:1778)

        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.processEvent(Widget.java:589)

        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.windowProc(Display.java:1774)
        at org.eclipse.swt.internal.gtk.OS.gtk_main_iteration(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1242)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1420)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:1403)
        at
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:775)
        at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:462)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
        at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)

        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:247)
